name: h3_geotoh3
title: H3 Geo to H3 Index
description: Converts geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude) to H3 index at specified resolution using the H3 library

inputs.name: input_table
inputs.title: Input table
inputs.description: The table containing latitude and longitude columns

inputs.name: latitude_column
inputs.title: Latitude column
inputs.description: The column containing latitude values (decimal degrees)

inputs.name: longitude_column
inputs.title: Longitude column
inputs.description: The column containing longitude values (decimal degrees)

inputs.name: resolution
inputs.title: H3 resolution
inputs.description: The H3 resolution (0-15, where 0 is coarsest and 15 is finest)

inputs.name: output_column_name
inputs.title: Output column name
inputs.description: Name for the output H3 index column

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with H3 index column added
